rows.label: tev026201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev026201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Nelly about the restricted hangar.

rows.label: tev026201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev026201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Nelly if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev026201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Nelly about the Skell found in Noctilum.

rows.label: tev026201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Nelly about the Skell stolen during the attack.

rows.label: tev026201_SEL4021
rows.name: Ask Nelly about recent developments.

rows.label: tev026201_SEL6011
rows.name: Ask Nelly about the fish on Mira.

rows.label: tev026201_SEL6021
rows.name: Ask Nelly about recent developments.

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Not even I know what's in there, and we're the ones
who are supposed to be guarding it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0002
rows.name:
You think it's some big new weapon, maybe?
Or a relic they found on Mira?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0003
rows.name:
All I know is that I'm supposed to guard it with my life,
so it must be crucial to human survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Well, they picked the right Mediator for the job.
Nobody's getting past me! Not even you, [ST:gender p1=buster p2=sister ]!
Two steps back! Right now! Hup![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0009
rows.name:
One of my fellow Mediators said he's really into me
and wants us to be a thing. I...don't know how I feel
about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0010
rows.name:
I mean, we're in the middle of a crisis, right?
It would feel really weird to be dating and...stuff.
Anyway, I've kind of been keeping him hanging.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0011
rows.name:
...Oh, don't get me wrong! I like him, I really do.
I mean, I really, REALLY like him. Hee![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I just don't know if I can balance a love life with
my work life. It's tough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0017
rows.name:
I saw that alien Skell when they put it in the restricted
hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0018
rows.name:
It didn't look like it would be operational anytime soon.
To be honest, it struck me as kind of underwhelming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Think the Ganglion yoinked the wrong superweapon?
I mean, we all make mistakes. Hell, I bought men's
deodorant by accident once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0024
rows.name:
I think it's safe to say it must be important to them,
considering the number of troops they expended on
getting it back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0025
rows.name:
Our investigative team didn't find anything special
about it, but hey, who knows. The thing might possess
unimaginable power that we just can't...um...imagine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0026
rows.name: It might even be like their version of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG0027
rows.name:
For all we know, something essential to their survival
was hiding in there and we missed it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG1001
rows.name:
Hey, that ball of honeysmoke you suggested added
just the right kick to my cooking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG1002
rows.name:
I added a tablespoonful as a secret spice, and it gave
my stew this sweet fragrance, but also a bit of sour.
It really brought out the umami of the ingredients.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG1003
rows.name:
...I've always wanted to say umami.
I feel like such a pro chef now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG1004
rows.name:
Even my boyfriend said he likes my cooking more than
ever. Isn't he sweet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG1005
rows.name: Anyway, you should try it. You won't be sorry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG2001
rows.name:
Hey! That high-temperature pot you suggested was a
complete disaster![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG2002
rows.name:
I thought it would be great to have a pan that never
cools down...until I started cooking with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG2003
rows.name:
It accumulated so much heat that I couldn't even touch
it with an oven mitt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG2004
rows.name:
I finally used tongs to wrestle it into a cabinet,
where it promptly MELTED INTO PLACE. I kid you not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG2005
rows.name:
In the end, I had to ask my friend to rip the whole
cabinet out with his Skell and bury it. Yep. Seriously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG2006
rows.name:
"High-temperature pot"? Pfft! They should call it the
"ALWAYS Hot Pot!" Get it? Because it won't...
Look, L needs to pay for my new cabinet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG3001
rows.name:
Hey there! That electric hammock you suggested has
changed my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG3002
rows.name:
Get this: I ran out of ingredients, so I took the
hammock out to the water and tried using it as a
fishing net.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG3003
rows.name:
This, as it turns out, was GENIUS. I raked in more
seafood than a baleen whale at a salmon run![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG3004
rows.name:
Then I told my friend, and she introduced me to some
xeno buyers who are willing to pay way more than I
make from BLADE missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG3005
rows.name:
Well, I know an opportunity when I smell one.
I ditched my low-income hangnail of a boyfriend and
started doing daily fishing trips.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG3006
rows.name:
In fact, I'm weeks—maybe even days—away from
developing a fishing Skell. And I owe it all to you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG3007
rows.name:
That fancy downtown house I've always dreamed about
is finally within reach. Suck it, BLADE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG4001
rows.name:
I never would have dreamed that honeysmoke could
add so much oomph to my cooking. It's incredible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG4002
rows.name:
My boyfriend is so head over heels for it that he
PROPOSED to me the other day. Can you imagine?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG4003
rows.name:
And I owe it all to you and L for coming up with it.
You're the best![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG5001
rows.name:
Add that to life experiences I never thought I'd have:
bashing in a wall of my room to extract a saucepan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG5002
rows.name:
I told my friend to bury the darned thing deep,
but I hear the soil there has risen to, shall we say,
"toasty" temperatures...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG5003
rows.name:
Seriously, why did you recommend that thing?
Were you trying to kill us all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG5004
rows.name:
I swear, L is going to pay for the repairs if it's the
last thing I do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG6001
rows.name:
The other day, when I was out fishing, I accidentally
pulled up a fish-like indigen called a "duoguill."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG6002
rows.name:
I guess they really like electricity, because the electric
hammock made the thing feistier than a dog in a
squeeze-toy factory. I couldn't keep it still![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG6003
rows.name: Darned thing burned all the other fish I caught to ash.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG6004
rows.name:
So if you ever run into one, whatever you do,
don't hit it with electric attacks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG6009
rows.name:
Once I finish developing my fishing Skell, I'll be taking
home enough fish to make my current haul pale in
comparison.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG6010
rows.name:
After that, it's just a matter of watching my income
skyrocket and building a personal fleet of ships.
Oh, and a fancy corporate HQ...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026201_MSG6011
rows.name:
I've got big dreams, baby! And I owe it all to L and
his electric hammock. There aren't enough words in
the world to thank you both![ST:wait ]
